content.detailedDescription:
Very bright blue white (like hid headlight intensity, or welder's arc color and intensity) elongated cone/teardrop with round end facing direction of travel and cone tapper toward rear, or shorter perfect sharp edged tail trailing. round head also had a slight copper/gold aura around white/blue color. moving very very slow 5-10 degrees w. of north at an altitude higher than nearby almost parrallel airliner contrail, to which it gradually passed behind, and very thin whispy cirrus cloud whisps. size/length from my location was comparable to width of two full moons in length, but only 1/4 a full moon in width at round head or widest part, as it tappered to a perfect point.
most noticible fator or feature is the sharp distinct edges and perfect straight lines. no vapor trail!! if not for sharp edges, could have been daytime slow, slow meteor. but going way too slow!!!
limited viewing time because of rising patchy fog and cumulus clouds. almost overcast but large breaks between clouds.

started heading n on i-95 to go to atlanta georgia. left miami at 6:15 am on 9/4/2009.
alot of early morning fog from west palm bch north, but started raising and transforming into low hung cumulus clouds from 9-9:30 am, as we passed through martin/st lucie counties.
as we entered brevard county at about 10 am.
at about 10:15-10:25 am i looked out the drivers window as i was driving and looked up as we had a big break in the semi-fog to low cumulus clouds at about due west of my position 65-75 degrees above the western horizon, to view a very bright blue sky, laced with one large airliner contrail, and whispy cirrus cloud whisps between two large cumulus cloud heads. to view the elongated cone with very sharp edges travelling very, very slow.
the airliner contrail was running due north and south parralell to i-95 and must have been there for more than 5 minutes as it was in the phase of expanding and the plane was no where near.
object was almost parrallel but to a 3-4 degree w. of north path, east of airliner contrail, which gradually took it behind the contrail before i lost sight of it due to clouds and to my direction and speed at 70 mph on 95 and maybe some blowing of cloud motion. no effect on me or my passengers or vehicle! passengers/my children were asleep in rear, my wife sitting on passenger side could not view it! i told her but she couldnt get an angle from the windshield to view.
didnt get anymore breaks in clouds for about 5-8 minutes at 70 mph.
next break couldnt see it anymore.
didnt leave any vapor trails at all.
fist assumtion, maybe a launch from cape kennedy as we were very close but still slightly south of nasa. object was moving north and west toward the cape????
content.summary: Elongated cone with round base appearing to be perfect edges with gold/copper aura

content.detailedDescription:
Took brake from night shift at job in issaquah, wa. noted an unusually bright twinkeling star 45 degree above horizon, n to ne slowly transiting left to right moiving at about 1/4 to 1" per 5 minutes  for period of 10 minutes in early dawn sky. path parallel ground. 
object was very brightly flashing or twinkeling much more than regular star, no other stars visible in predawn sky. went to get field glasses in car, 10x25 power. object appeared as bright white cross with long axis pointed to ground and tipped 15 degree off vertical to right. horizontal axis appeared brighter and flashing left to right, blue, green, white, orange with clockwise rotation(?).
speed constant from west to east. observed 10 minutes. focus of binoculars checked multiple times against 1/2 moon to west, in case it was optical artifact, focus good, field glass propped against stable base.
unsure whether object man made satellite or planet or something else entirely. the colored 'rotating lights'and odd shape struck me as curious.Have not noticed a star like appearing like this before.
content.summary: Strobing cross shaped colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
Final notice, sorry i can't edit the previous one.
the moving planet is mercury. the odd unknown objects are the bright ones mercury is passing by. too strong to be stars, they are none of the known planets either. here is the sky map published by stereo, showing only the planet mercury in the camera field.
content.summary: Stereo a: mercury is ok, the others are not

content.detailedDescription:
This movie is composed from september 2009 images of stereo ahead satellite.
please check stereo a telescope hi1 for the latest
http://stereo-ssc.Nascom.Nasa.Gov/beacon/latest/ahead_hi1_latest.Jpg
browse archives http://stereo-ssc.Nascom.Nasa.Gov/cgi-bin/images
the same objects should appear some days later on soho and stereo b
while not ruling out the possibility the objects to be natural space bodies known to specialists, they seem odd enough to draw our attention and constant monitoring
content.summary: Stereo a objects - movie

content.detailedDescription:
Stereo ahead satellite records multiple objects next to mercury, bigger and brighter than mercury
browse archives from camera ahead hi1
 http://stereo-ssc.Nascom.Nasa.Gov/cgi-bin/images
content.summary: Stereo a satellite records multiple objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the movie premiere of the swedish movie "flickan som lekte med elden", and me, my mom and her bodyguards were walking home. just when we go out of the cinema, i looked up in the sky. two spotlights were shooting up in the sky from the cinema. i love spotlights in the sky, because it looks so cool. so, i kept looking at the pillars of light while slowly walking across the marketsquare. then suddenly, i see a light that flies by very fast. i thought it was a meteorite or something, because i only saw it for a second, and then it disappeared over the roof of the mall called "pub". i was really happy, because i love rare events such as meteorites. but then, still looking at the sky, i see a new object! however, this one gets hit by the spotlight and reflects the light like it was a mirror! i quickly realise that a rock doesn't reflect light that well, satellites are too far up, airplanes are also too far up to cause the size of the reflection and so on.
when the reflection was at it's biggest, it was probably... a little smaller than my pinkynail. both objects were flying at the same direction i think, and if so, both were west-bound. the second object came approximately 5 seconds after the first one. i was really shocked afterwards, because i realised that this was my first sighting were i actually had a clue about the material it was made from.

another maybe important note; at the premiere there were many swedish celebrities, and i saw 5 or more highly ranked politicians, most from the current government. there were also actors, movie-makers, famous journalists etc. i don't know, but it just seems a little intended that two objects flew above the cinema just when a huge number of famous and loved people were starting to exit the building.
content.summary: 2 objects, one with a shiny surface, flying on "low" altitude.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my now ex-girlfriend were driving home after work. we were eastbound on i-8 from downtown yuma to the yuma foothills near wellton. over the mountains separating yuma from wellton i seen 4 lights rise above the mountains. i had lived in yuma for 4 years during which i've seen every piece of hardware and equipment the military sends into the air. my girlfriend and i both knew these 4 objects were nothing we had seen before. they resembled the moon but much smaller but that is what the coloring reminded me of was the moon on a smokey night. the large size of these objects was very apparent. in order for the objects to appear as they did while we were driving meant they had to be large, flying low, and a distance away. i believed the lights to be in the direction of phoenix. we were both quite excited by the sighting. it was like being a little kid again, seeing something for the first time. there were some poor quality pictures of the objects which are no longer in my possession. we lost sight of the objects as we neared the mountains and i never seen them again. the next day i was at my father's house and he was watching tv and a commercial for the local news came on and i seen the video of what i had seen the night before. i told him chanel "my ex" and i had seen those ufo's the night before. i sat down to watch the report and it said it was a phoenix sighting and some air force goon had said it was his neighbor who had tied flares to balloons and released them. i thought the report was laughable because i had witnessed this from yuma! this is my first report i've made about the incident. i have only told close friends up to now.
content.summary: Ufo sighting from yuma

content.detailedDescription: We were in dyer indiana going east headed for home,when we sighted what we first thought was a hot air ballon firing up but was to high up and moving to fast.It took about 7 minutes to go from east to west.Comercial planes were headed east to west and were't nearly as high and not as fast.We both have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Fireball going east to west

content.detailedDescription:
I live very near the evansville regional airport and see planes often.  this object came from the ne and made a slow circle above our home and headed se in nearly the direction it came.

it looked as if two dark diamonds were placed end to end.  it had colored lights on each tip and a center row of white lights running along the underneath.

it was moving slow enough to go in and grab my wife.  she came out and it was directly above our house.  she said, "what is that?  i've never seen anything like it before."  it almost looked like a floating platform and was extremely large in size.   it was a very quiet craft except for a slight humming noise.  

not sure what it was, but it was definitely unlike anything i've ever seen in the sky.  if it was military, let's hope it's on our side.
content.summary: Diamond shaped flyover

content.detailedDescription: My wife was sitting near our front door and noticed a bright light outside ( it was dark 17:40 hrs ). she got up and observed a dark round object with a lime green light surrounding it appearing to hover in the sky above the tree line behind a neighbors house ( very wooded ). the distance of the object was maybe less than a mile away and after 5 or 6 seconds of watching the object and bright lime green light she said part of it seem to explode and orange and red pieces began to fall to the ground with the large illuminated part also falling to the ground. no noise or crash was heard at all. the incident was reported to blount co. sheriff's office and an officer was dispatched to patrol the area. my wife stated she does not think it was a meteor because of the way it hovered and she was sure it had a bright lime green glow to it.
content.summary: Bright lime green with no sound object expoldes and falls in blount co. alabama

content.detailedDescription: Bright star, thought it might be venus or saturn, then it started to fade and split. smaller bright object moved to what appeared to be down and west of larger object which faded away, possibly up.
content.summary: Bright star @ ~ 80 degrees up from south horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, 
i'm living in hoboken nj and am a big follower of ufo's. on monday 14 sept at 5.26pm i was going outside to have a smoke and as always i look up at the sky. it's a very clear day out today and when i looked up i could see a plane shining and just to the left of the plane was a shiny object just floting. i ran inside and grabed my binoculars to have a look. the object was a good few 100 feet in the air if not 1000 feet. it looked like it was a circle shape but when i looked at it trough the binoculars it was in a triangle shape and was silver and gray as there was a reflection off the sun. it was just sitting there for about 2 mins and then it started to move up. when i went to grab my phone out of my pocket it disapired. just wanted to let you know what i saw and that it's not the first ufo iv seen in new york/new jersey. i'm still keeping an eye out now so if i see anything else il let you know. 

thanks 

brian
content.summary: Ufo spotted over new york city

content.detailedDescription:
Viewing the hills that surround denbigh hospital, i observed an object at a distance of approximatley 8 - 10 miles on a clear day with few clouds. the object which looked like a bright light, which on first viewing i felt was probably an aircraft with the sun shining on its fuselage, was flying at an approximate height of 500 feet following the contour of the hills, when it very suddenly made a 45 degree change of direction and acceleration to very high speed, with its new direction being upwards and contrary to the direction i was facing....Giving me the impression its heading was "towards" me, though out into the atmosphere. i lost sight of it very quickly due to its acceleration. there was no accompanying sound or other phenomena before or after the event. the object had the appearence of a bright star, which became brighter as it sped away. 
i am unsure as to the compass heading of the object as i was in an unfamiliar location. however i felt i was facing south south east.

there were no witnesses.

i have served in the royal airforce, and have experience in
observation, recording and identification of areial phenomena.
content.summary: Object performing high speed change of direction and acceleration.

content.detailedDescription:
After i went to bed, i looked out the window and saw a dark triangle shaped object which was almost stationary. it had round lights at each corner which were alternating between red and white. i did not get a very good look as i was viewing it through some trees. after about four minutes it left.
note that this is very similar to sightings in wv and ohio that happened within a few days of each other.
content.summary: Dark triangle with round lights at corners.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on i-65 in johnson county.  it was well after sunset, so the sky was dark.  just before the whiteland exit, i saw through my windshield what at first i thought was a shooting star.  the white light fell with a fast, straight, diagonal light trail like a shooting star. then it stopped falling and "bounced" off in a completely different direction, appearing to move away from me.  i could see the parabolic path of the bounce because of the light trail.  when it came down out of the bounce, it disappeared as if the light turned off.
it's hard to say how high or far away the object was from me, but the light was too small to be a plane by the percieved distance from my car while i was moving.  it appeared to me that it was higher than the trees.
i've seen other unexplained objects in this same stretch of interstate, so i wasn't surprized or scared, just curious as to what it was.
content.summary: Bouncing light

content.detailedDescription:
Hi  

here is what we saw on the 4-09-2009 at approximately 22.05 hours me my wife and our neighbour witnessed  the event- the night sky was completely clear and little to no breeze when i notice a flying object bright orange in colour and sphere shaped come from behind the tree line from behind the tree line ( i was standing in are back garden ) my neighbour came rushing out of her house as she had noticed it from her window. i quickly called my wife and grab the video camera when a second object appeared following the exact flight path as the first the were travelling at quite some speed and making no sound what so ever. i have got some hd footage of the objects and hope some one can shed some light on what these are please find attached. one other point is that our local paper had printed a article on what sounds like the same objects just 2 weeks previous but no explanation has been given for the event in which several people in 2 different locations reported seeing the objects. i look forward to your response 

also i would estimate the objects to be at about 700 feet 

parkend 
gloscestshire
 england

regards mark
content.summary: Bright orange lights not chineese lanterns

content.detailedDescription: While i was on vacation at myrtle beach,s.C i was in our hotel room getting a book that i had been reading when out of the corner of my eye an orange light, outside the balcony of our hotel, caught my attention. at first i thought it was fireworks that i had heard someone shooting further down the beach. however something didn't seem right about it. i walked out on the balcony to get a better look and as i did more lights appeared about twenty feet up from where i was standing on the eighth floor and a hundred feet out over the ocean. they were rectangle in shape with a pale orange glow. one light at first, then two light. they flashed out then reappeared as three set close together, then a gap and another light. four lights altogether. i called for my husband to come look. as he stepped through the door a helicopter started approaching and the lights went out. i watched for a long time afterward but they never reappeared.  as i looked off of the balcony i noticed that a pier a long way down the beach had similar lights. i wondered if the craft was invisible but was reflecting those lights. it was late in the evening around 11:00 p.M. the sky was very dark and i couldn't see a craft only the lights. or possibly it just happened to fast for me to be able to pick out a shape in the dark sky. i heard no sounds over the roar of the ocean waves. i am sure of what i saw and it wasn't fireworks. fireworks don't appear as rectangle lights that flash off and on like a flash light cutting on and off.
content.summary: Orange lights over the ocean appear disappear then reappear as i watch off of hotel balcony.

content.detailedDescription: At 5:05 in the morning, i went to take my dogs outside. it was a very clear morning, a bright cresent moon, very dark still. i looked up, saw a bright light to the east/south east that appeared to be flashing and changing position sightly. it was acting like a hovering object that was "bobbing" up and down and to the left/right some. it was not stable in place, but it was not also moving in any particular direction, just maintaing it's position more or less. randomly much smaller whitish lights would flash at various ditances from the main light. some would be very close, some would be quite far away (maybe 30 or so widths of the main light). watching, it became quite obvious to me this not ust a star or planet. i looked around the sky. and to the east i saw another one, brighter that the first. same "bobbing" movement, same random radial flashing lights. i watched them for about 10 miuntes. at this point i went inside to get my wife so she could verify what i was seeing, and we observed them from our bedroom window. after about 5 minutes, i went outside again, stood the same spot and noticed that the second light had drifted to the south east some. it's location over the trees had changed, yet the first one had stayed more or less in the same location - again using the tree tops as reference and being in the same spot as i had previously been. i began to look around the sky some more, and began noticing other ligts doing the exact same thing as the first 2. these were less bright, some not much brighter than the stars (2 were right near the stars in orion's belt and not much brighter). all had the flashing lights that blinked randomly around the main light. i counted 7 total. the arrangment in the sky seemed random, some were lower toward the horizon, some higher, but all were to the east and south east. after maybe a total of 35 minutes watching them, the flashing smaller lights seemed to stop, leaving only the main light in each of the 7 cases. i watched them until dawn, at which point they began to fade into the light. all except for the second one i observed seemed to stay in place more or less.
content.summary: Approx. 7 bright lights, each moving or shifting position silghtly with random blinking radial lilghts

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a small town in eastern washington. we never have flight traffic over town with the exception of crop dusters and "heart flight". on or about july 15,2009, at 2:30am i was awakened from sleep by the sound of helicopters. i use a cpap breathing machine which generates a fair amount of internal noise (ie: i can hear it's pumping inside my head, but exterially, it's almost silent), so the noise was loud enough to wake me up. i live in a two story house with a sleeping porch off my bedroom. the sleeping porch has large windows across the front of the house. i went to the windows and i saw a black hawk helicopter flying due n-nw at minimum height. there were the lights of other copters already ahead of the one i heard. as i watched, in about 2 minutes another came over in the same straight direction. i counted out 2 minutes and another and then another came over the town. i got the impression they were pursing something. i watched as they began an intense search at about 10-15 miles north of town. the copters set up a perimiter, with one at each corner of a grid, and the others (there appeared to be 6 to 8 total), began moving east to west and west to east. the entire time i watched, there was a sound in the air of a very low decible hum, which made a kind of whum, whum, sound (higher to lower range and back again). i watched for about 1 and 1/2 hours. since i had to get up for work, i finally packed it in. two days later my daughter witnessed several strange events. she was driving home from a movie at about 11:30 pm on the 17the when she witnessed a black helicopter (it was silhouted against the sky and clearly black) flying out of the direction of our town. when she reached home, she got out of the car and heard the whum whum noice and noticed a strage glow in the north north-east emitting pulses almost like heat lightening, but it had a 1-2-3 rythm. the same rythm over and over...Low glow, medium glow, high glow. there were no clouds in the sky, only the strange glow. the pulsing and hum went on all night. about 4 days after that, my daughter was out walking. it was a calm day, no wind, no storms etc. then suddenly she heard the hum again and was hit by a sudden blast of air that rushed past her. 
  about 15 days ago my daughter again noticed the pulsing lights. she went out onto the porch to sit and watch ias it was only a few miles out of town in the north. suddenly a helicopter emerged from the glow and skirted the edge of town. a few minutes later she started to gag stumbled into the house calling to me "mom can't you smell that?" she was overcome by an intense smell of something very pungent, very acrid, and metalic. we ran around the house and closed all the windows and doors. i got her a painter's face mask and that helped keep out the smell for her. we were baffled by why she could smell it, and i could not. she would say.. oh it's gone and then get up and as she passed by a window, she would retch again. two of our dogs could not smell it, but one got a terrible sneezing fit. she has always had an acute sense of smell, but what was she smelling? we know the smell of every farm chemical and this was nothing she had smelled before. i
 i read where on july 24, 2009, a crop circle was discovered at wibur, washington. if you take a ruler and lay it on a washington state map the  line would be a straight going north-north west and in the exact line the copters flew over town and headed away the first night i saw them.
 then on the  night of september 11, 2009, my daughtr and i went outside to star gaze. we saw a "star" headed across the sky from west to east in a straight line, about 15 degrees above the horizon. it got very much brighter, and accellerated up and away from it's position at a high rate of speed disappearing into the dark. i hate to say it, but it looked just like star trek when the ship jumps into hyperspace. we then saw a "star moving directly overhead and zig-zagging from it's center position to the west,back to center, back to west, back to center. the degree of zig-zag was small, but very discernable. i then saw another "star" move, stop, turn in a circle, then disappear. my daughter then saw a small globe of light, perhaps 40ft off the ground streak past her. we went inside, scared but a little excited.
 then last night, september 12, 2009, at about 10:30pm, we went back outside and saw a bright object, much like an aiplane when seen head on in the sky near the mountains. (it was not an airplane..There were no running lights, no noise). we were watching it, when it suddenly moved at a very high rate of speed directly towards us, covering 25 miles in seconds. we were terrified. it stopped at the edge of town, which is only 3 blocks away and hovered perhaps 200ft above the ground. it was very bright,very menacing, silent,shaped like an orb with spikes coming out and seemed to have a compainion light under it to one side. we were very scared. we ran into the house and we peeked out of a window and it stayed positioned for about 2 hours. at one point i watched the light blink out, only to go back to the window later and see it was back.  we turned on all the lights in the house, locked the doors and windows, brought in the cat and huddled in the living room afraid to sleep. at about 3am my daughter went to the kitchen window over the sink. that side of the house is very dark with no outdoor light and a large tree in the yard. she turned off the lights, pulled back the curtain and screamed. she saw a grey shape, about 4ft tall, grey colored from top to bottom, in an approximate human form moving rapidly across the yard from south to north. 
  i cannot begin to tell you how frightened we are by what has occured. we are not hoaxing you, we are just regular people caught in an abnormal and frightening situation. i just read where a pilot from oregon witnessed a bright silent light hover over his home. his "ufo" sounds like the same type as we witnessed.
content.summary: Bright light moved rapidly from the n-ne, hovered at edge of town 8hrs. grey sighted at appox 3am "moving rapidly through yard"

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i always sit out in the backyard and watch the stars. we never thought we'd see what we saw tonight. it was so fast that we nearly missed it. she was sitting in the hammock and i was sitting a short distance from her in a lawn chair when we saw this quick burst of phosphorescent blue in a pattern that can be likened to a chevron but in boomerang formation. there was one blue arrow-like spot in the front. there were 4 others behind it slightly staggered, but equal distance apart. it was large and appeared in a faint cloud formation to the east of our home. in the blink of an eye, it had jumped quite a distance and just blinked in and out and was gone. it looked like it could have been the under lighting of a large craft, but being ex-military, i don't think we have technology that moves in the blink of an eye. my wife is especially sensitive to electromagnetic and static charges and she reported having tingling in her extremeties when the incident occurred. she says her hands are still tingling. we were actually preparing to come back into the house when it happened, but we braved the mosquitoes to see if it would reoccur. it did not. i've never seen anything move that fast. if we hadn't both seen it, i'd be wondering if it was an illusion of some type. strange stuff. she googled "phosphorescent blue lights in az sky" and that brought us here. we did noticed that other people from our area had reported a different type of incident on 9/11. we were totally unprepared for it so we do not have photos. we will be keeping the digital camera handy from this point forward.
content.summary: Phosphorescent blue chevron pattern, fast moving

content.detailedDescription:
It's a clear night, and i was spending some time in the hot tub with my wife checking out the sky.  we noticed a object that appeared to be making little circles in the sky.  it was brighter than most other objects in the sky, and it's movements started and stopped in a odd way. one moment it would look like a bright white star or planet, next it looked like it was being wizzed around in a food processor.

so i jumped out of the hot tub, grabbed my camera, set up the tripod...And set its exposure to 8 seconds, and set the self timer (to avoid shaking).  i tried to take several pictures, but as i started to take pictures the object seemed to disappear and reappear. in the matter of a minute or so, i was able to snap about 5 pictures before the object had disappeared for good.

i only caught one picture of the object.  but upon looking at the picture, it seemed to not be making "little circles" but a zig zag shape movements. 

i have attached the orginal photo.  i also attached the photo, with adjusted contrast and brightness.  

in terms of my orientation of n, e, s, w...I'm not sure of that fact.  my camera was faced pretty much straight up in the sky.  and as for the amout of time that i saw it, it wasn't but just a couple of minutes from the time we first saw it, until it disappeared for good.
content.summary: A white starish object in the sky near snowshoe wv

content.detailedDescription: Out in front of my daughters home. look up and very bright light appears as close as a helicopter overhead. there was no sound as it moved directly north. then suddenly it turned on a dime to direct east. it traveled some distance and then just suddenly disappeared. there were no running lights of any kind. it just appeared to be an intensely white glow. i have never seen or ever expected to see something like this ever. but me my wife my daughter  my son in law and my youngest daughter all witnessed this together. my youngest daughter recorded the last seconds of this event on her cell phone video recorder. i have 47 years of experience looking into the sky, and have never not been able to identify everything i have ever seen.I cant explain this one.
content.summary: Bright light 90 degree couse change no sound very close disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Wife and my self and another couple were camped at the lion club park      in clermont.The day of the brick yard 400 the year 2004. iwent for a walk on the bike path'as i came back to our motorhome . iducked under a tuliptree limb as ilooked up past the post office i saw a plane,it looked odd .All i could see were the two wings,it was covered with a white fog that made the wings get fatter as it encircled wings kind looked like bubble wrap.I horrered up at the plane ,what the hell goin on up there,     i  then looked to see where the fog was coming from,i steped out to entrence road and across the street about100 feet abovethe house ,two vapor came  streames came out no where,clear bluesky above.I then hollered that plane cant fly like that,i watched the planefor about five minutes, as i watched the secondstream enveloped the whole plane i said to myself, that plane is going to crash,i am going to be eye witness.I watched for five minutes. then in the blink of an eye, the plane was gone the twovapor trails were gone the only thing left was clear blue sky thats my story.
content.summary: Ufo stopped in flight was caught by two white vapor streams.

content.detailedDescription: I am passing this on from some friends of mine who have become amateur ufo hunters as a result of this sighting which was captured by them with a digital camera and by cell phone cameras. see below
content.summary: A sphere with uniform radiating colored circles within its orb

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work and right when i was in front of the dairy farm on sparta avenue, almost to the city of sparta in kent county, michigan i saw a very bright light out the corner of my eye and i looked up out of my windshield. i saw a bright blue light fall fast then slow down and zigzag as it fell. i saw it for about 7-10 seconds until i couldn't see it anymore because trees were blocking my view. i immediately looked at the time on my car stereo after observing this light and it was 5:37am (est). it possibly could have been a meteorite, but i don't know if they zigzag and behave like this did. it was easy to tell it was very near, i would say it hit the ground somewhere around the pamida store or around m-37.
content.summary: Blue ball of light falling from sky and zig-zagging.

content.detailedDescription: Was in my at4 hole with battle buddy, was my watch so he was sleeping, was a full moon or close to it, looked up and saw a object in sky moving very slowly, woke battle buddy up and asked him if he knew what it could be, he said he didn't know, so i was kinda freaked out, it wasn't making any noise, and was moving to slow to be a b-52, not to mention to quiet, there were 3 lights on each end of it, look like a perfect triangle, if i recall correctly the lights were a white color, they were a constant glow, no pulsing or shifting.. still freaks me out to this day,
content.summary: Was out on ftx for army training.

content.detailedDescription:
during the bombardment of bagdad cnn was showing continualy the air strikes on tv. i was shopping in a big box store one evening and stopped by a tv display. all the sets were showing the bombardment. i wacthed fasinated. the feed was coming from a camera set up in the dessert at night. i believe it was an unmaned camera. suddenly an object skimed low across the dessert floor from the lower right corner of the screen to the upper left and disappered into the darkness.
   i had nothing in view to compare for size but guess about fifteen to twenty feet in diameter. the shape was like an upside down meat-pie dish, flat on top and bottom and circular. rectangular windows with changing colored lights which seemed to move clock-wise rotation. the windows were evenly spaced around the sides of the craft.
   this craft was a sharp and well defined picture, silvery metalic and silent.
   i was amazed at what i was seeing! my thoughts were that it was most likly a man made secret project.
content.summary: Cnn camera out in the dessert at night captured unknown objectflying low across dessert.

content.detailedDescription:
In response to id,us on 9/12/2009.. at approx 2:30 am sunday 9/13/09, i went out on my deck for a few minutes and looked to the northeastern-east sky. i seen 3 very bright flashing multicolored lights. there was also others as the same at a further distance. these objects were not clustered together. if these are spaceships, they are colorful little buggers! makes me think of christmas.  : )

on other nites, i have seen them in the western sky also. 

i am a believer because of my passed experiences. one in summer of 1966 when i was outside walking a path to my aunts house next door to where i lived. i was 12 years old and seen the ship(disc) going down in our field about 200 ft away. i ran back to my house and sat on the couch facing the picture window. scared to death. within minutes, i seen a glowing ball(soccer ball size) pass from east to west across the window as if to say "we know you seen us"! 

in april 2007, it was a clear nite. i pulled into my driveway, got out of my car and a glowing ball (soccer ball size) appeared right in front of me about 10 feet out. it was there for 2 seconds and disappeared with a boom.  (same as i seen in the year of 1966)
my boyfriend was in my house and heard the boom also.

then 3 weeks later 5/11/07, i and another person had a small ship fly very slowly approx. 50 feet above our heads at the establishment where we work.
note !!... at around that time period, i was wishing that i would see a ufo again before i die.(wishes do come true) i thought this because my nephew who was in the navy observed and reported a red light over the smoke stacks at puget sound in wa state march 2007. (my nephew was contacted by peter davenport of nuforc and it was listed as a creditable sighting on the main page of that website.) as far as this 5/11/07 incident goes, my navy nephew commented that the government would not have aircraft flying over massillon ohio.

maybe our government is capable of making such airships.. but i can't believe a glowing ball suspended in mid air or floating and just disappearing in front of your face!  

someday, the truth will be known to all. we are being watch over .. 
...We need to be!

i am on the ufo sites everyday. thanks to all who do report their truthful sightings.

god bless.  live long and prosper!
content.summary: Flashing star like objects in northeastern sky and other experience.

content.detailedDescription:
I heard my neighbors outside late last night.  they were in awe as they saw three red/orange objects in the clear sky.  i witnessed these three circular shaped objects in the sky, over eighty thousand feet above.  the objects seemed to be as high as the highest dimly lit star.  they were as small as the smallest farthest star.  i was standing  at 33degrees 52���13.03��� n.  117 degrees 33���45.71���w.  looking 75 degrees to the south by south west.  

the objects were in my sight for about 10 to 15 minutes.  two of the objects simultaneously moved at a 90 degree angle south with the third object shooting out at a 90digree angle north.  if the moon were to be in place directly behind the objects then the objects would be the width of two moons.  the objects then went so high that i could not longer keep them in sight.
content.summary: Three orange circular objects in the evening sky hovered for 12 minutes and then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
My friend was driving me to the airport 9/10/09. we were on pena blvd when i turned to look at her and saw a very large dark rectangular shape in the sky north/northwest of dia. it appeared fairly stationary and i my first thought was that dorothy wasn't in kansas anymore. when she saw it she said what i had been thinking. it looked like a huge house--with no roof.

the bottom and sides were very straight and squared off. the top was straight but not as linear as the other sides and was a bit fuzzy on the top and right. there were low clouds being built from chemtrail grids at the time as well, but the object was below those clouds. 

the object was a good distance away--ten or more miles, hard to tell--and the perspective on size was difficult until a plane appeared adjacent to it. the plane was very bright silver and very small in perspective to the rectangle (maybe 100 to 1 or greater). other planes landing and taking off that day did not have the same appearance as the silver plane near the object. 

my friend and i watched the object as we drove and it may have begun to move, but we were moving so can't be sure of that. when we looked back, it was gone. we had sight of it for a minute or so. i would love to know if anyone else saw this object as well.
content.summary: Rectangular black object north of denver international airport
